title: NO SOUND
content: Hi! Anything that I'm opening via Mozilla, be it youtube or google meet, there is no audio. However, the videos on my laptop do have sound. Also, i cross checked on Google Chrome, there is sound there as well. There is some problem with my Mozilla. Please help me find out why
creator: urvashij07

title: How to temporarily disable password manager
content: I would like to temporarily disable the password manager before the computer goes to sleep or I leave it on in an active state and walk away from it for a short time. I do not want to exit FF but would like to keep all tabs open. As of now, if the computer sleeps, and upon awaking, I try access a password protected website FF will fill in the password and will not require a Password Manager Primary password. I would like FF to require the Primary password up awaking from the sleep state, and also be able turn off the password manager while the computer is in an active state.
creator: sunstarry7

title: Problémy s Firefoxem
content: Dobrý den, v poslední době mám problémy s Firefoxem a to například, že mi nevyplní Captchu na stránkách, které to požadují a vlastně se vůbec nepřihlásím na stránku(například Aukro) a jiné prohlížeče problémy nemají. Taky u stahování souborů mám problémy, že mi vyskočí hláška selhalo a neustále musím stahování obnovovat, je možné problémy nějak vyřešit? Děkuji za odpověď Slavík
creator: carfi.1988

title: Bookmark
content:
Hi,

I tried to bookmark a page but I was not successful in Firefox (am also using Chrome and I was able to do it there). I tried using Ctrl + D and using a mouse by clicking the star, both were unsuccessful. There was no error message.

Can you help? Thanks.

Regards, Eddie Choy
creator: kwchoy

title: Firefox will not allow Streaming from SBS. How can I get this frustrating browser set up to allow streaming??
content: Trying to stream the 2022 World cup soccer from SBS but I can't get past the Ad blocker and/or the whitelist for SBS.The google search results have not provided any solutions. eg Preferences are not where google suggest . Do you have a chatline? I've just about given up on firefox. Thanks for listening Rosco

title: Firefox sometimes closses by itself
content: I use Firefox 107.0 (64-bit) on a Windows laptop. Recently, the browser closes on its own. when I restart Firefox all my previous tabs have been closed.

title: Website firewall
content:
hi, i can not visit this website on firefox for linux. https://api.szfx.top/bing/api/?day=0

the uploaded image says that in chinese : Your request has illegal parameters and has been blocked by the website administrator!

the firewall service is supported by Pagoda Website Firewall Free Edition, which website is https://www.bt.cn/new/index.html

thank you for help!

title: BING POP UP AS DEFAULT BROWSER.
content: WHY BING POP UP ALL THE TIME WHEN I HAVE FIREFOX AS MY DEFAULT BROWER??? ANY HELP!!!!

title: Google Docs editor broken
content:
The last couple of days the Google Docs editor is semi-broken. Specifically, most of the tabs near the top have no text in them. They're just white boxes.

On the other hand, I can type text into the editor as normal.

The problem does not occur in Chromium-based browsers such as Chrome and Brave.

I'm working with Firefox on Windows, and Firefox reports it's up to date.

I've attached a cropped screenshot showing the problem.
creator: john558

title: Twitter Video Streaming in Firefox is Terrible
content: Twitter Video Streaming in Firefox on an older computer (Windows 7) does not work. The videos don't play (just audio). I logged into my same Twitter account on Chrome on the same computer and Twitter video streaming worked perfectly. Please fix the disparity.
creator: brookse321
